mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to Capt. C. M. Stigleman from M. H. Holt
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, January 18, 1862, to Capt. C. M. Stigleman from M. H. Holt at Chamborazo Hospital, Richmond, Va. Subject: Receipt of note and $15.00 from Capt. Stigleman, a furlough for 30 days for J. M. Stigleman, and he, Mr. Holt, is requesting a furlough. 4 original pieces.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
